summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Sunday 30 January to end of Monday 31 January GMT
description: After a settled start to Sunday, a breeze will develop and then strengthen throughout the day to effectively disperse local emissions.<br/><br/>Strong winds are then expected during Monday, again giving good local dispersion.<br/><br/>With relatively 'clean' air arriving from the Atlantic on Sunday and Monday, imported pollution should not be a concern.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
